org.canova.api.io.serializers

Class SerializationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.api.conf.Configured
      • org.canova.api.io.serializers.SerializationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable

    public class SerializationFactory
extends Configured

    A factory for Serializations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializationFactory(Configuration conf)
      Serializations are found by reading the io.serializations property from conf, which is a comma-delimited list of classnames.
